title: Motor Carrier Insurance Filing System
text_content:
Filing Insurance Electronically
Virginia DMV offers insurance companies a service to electronically file insurance for motor carriers online vs submitting paper forms. This service option allows insurance companies to submit individual filings or to send a file containing multiple insurance filings.
Companies can submit the following types of information electronically:
Form E - Motor Carrier Bodily Injury and Property Damage Liability Certificates
Form H - Motor Carrier Cargo Certificates
Form K - Notice of Cancellation
Form G - Motor Carrier Bodily Injury and Property Damage Liability Surety Bonds
Form J - Motor Carrier Cargo Surety Bonds
Binder  - Liability or Cargo
In addition, insurance companies using this service will be able to view and print the summary of any certificate of insurance, notice of cancellation, or binder entered online.
If you are an insurance company and are interested in taking advantage of this service, please contact Use Agreement Services by email at
useagreement@dmv.virginia.gov
or by phone at (804) 474-2294 for more information.
